body: The screenshot is with "Windows PowerShell" in title, not 7.1,.

python 3.8
```python
s = "我爱祖国"
print (s+'default')
str1 = s.encode(encoding="utf-8",errors="strict")
str2 = s.encode("gb2312") #编码错误的处理方案默认为"strict"
str3 = s.encode("gbk")
print(str1.decode(encoding="utf-8",errors="strict")+'utf8')#用utf-8的解码格式，解码str1.
print(str1.decode(encoding="gbk",errors="ignore")+'gbk-i')##如果以gbk的解码格式对str1进行解码得，将无法还原原来的字符串内容
print(str1.decode(encoding="gbk",errors="strict")+'gbk-s')
print(str1.decode(encoding="gbk",errors="replace")+'gbk-r')
print("\n")
print(str2.decode("gb2312")+'gb2312')
print(str3.decode("gbk")+'gbk')
```
pwsh7.1
```powershell
write-host 'Direct output' -ForegroundColor DarkRed
& C:/Users/he/scoop/apps/python/current/python.exe c:/Users/he/Desktop/sh/weixin/tests1.py
$test=& C:/Users/he/scoop/apps/python/current/python.exe c:/Users/he/Desktop/sh/weixin/tests1.py
write-host 'variable output' -ForegroundColor  DarkRed
    

$test
function test-encode {
    PAram([string]$data)
    if (-not($data)) { Write-Error "没有输入值,例如：测试"; break; }

    $ErrorActionPreference = "SilentlyContinue"
    $format = for (($i = 0), ($j = 1); $i -lt $encode.length; ($i += 2), ($j += 2)) {
        [PScustomobject]@{'编码' = $([string]$encode[$i]+'-'+$encode[$j]); '字符' = [System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8.GetString([System.Text.Encoding]::GetEncoding([int]$encode[$i]).GetBytes($data))
        }
    }

    $format #|select-string -Pattern '测试'
}
test-encode $test
```

What is  chcp output? Maybe you need to switch console to Unicode.
